summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1727, for the improvement of Pike Street from Broadway to 12th Avenue; and 12th Avenue, from East Pike Street to Madison Street, all in the City of Seattle by constructing a 16 feet plank roadway thereon; under Ordinance No. 18331 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
